title: Sidney Bechet - Rare Recordings 1947-1953 (Laserlight)
description:
SIDNEY BECHET - RARE RECORDINGS 1947-1953

1. Polka Dot Stomp
2. Kansas City Man Blues
3. Jazz Me Blues
4. Sugar
5. Dear Old Southland
6. Blues In My Heart
7. Indiana
8. Basin Street Blues
9. Honeysuckle Rose
10. "C" Jam Blue
11. On The Sunny Side Of The Street

Tracks 1-3:
George Brunis (tb), Albert Nicholas (cl), Danny Barker (g), George "Pops" Foster (b), Warren "Baby" Dodds (d); guests: Sidney Bechet (ss), Bob Wilder (ss), James P. Johnson (p), Wild Bill Davison (cnt)
New York City, April 19, 1947 Broadcast

Tracks 4-5:
Wild Bill Davison (cnt), Jimmy Archey (tb), Albert Nicholas (cl), Joe Sullivan (p), Danny Barker (g), George "Pops" Foster (b), Warren "Baby" Dodds (d), Sidney Bechet (ss)
New York City July 12, 1947 Broadcast

Track 6:
Wild Bill Davison (cnt), Cutty Cutshall (tb), Peanuts Hucko (cl), Ernie Caceres (bs), Gene Schroeder (p), Eddie Condon (g), Jack Lesberg (b), Sidney "Big Sid" Catlett (d), Sidney Bechet (ss)
New York City, July 9, 1949 Broadcast

Tracks 7-11:

Sidney Bechet (ss), Vic Dickenson (tb), Geoge Wein (p), Jimmy Woode (b), Buzzy Drootin (d)
Boston Massachusetts, October 25, 1953

1990 Laserlight Digital
